--- title: "Redesign" execute: echo: false --- ## Redesign Redesigning the Original Graph #### Creating a Dotplot ::: {.cell} ::: From the Original Graph Percentages of Men and Women are stored in the Men and Women Vector respectively and then these two vector values are stored in the Matrix form by using cbind. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Men Women [1,] 10 17 [2,] 23 43 [3,] 50 30 [4,] 5 2 [5,] 12 7 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Men Women Strong feminist 10 17 Feminist 23 43 Not a feminist 50 30 Anti-feminist 5 2 No opinion 12 7 ``` ::: ::: The below dotplot visualizes opinions about feminism based on gender, with points representing percentages in different categories. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](redesign_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: Taking Mean of the provided data and displayed in the descending order based on type. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Strong feminist Feminist Not a feminist Anti-feminist No opinion 13.5 33.0 40.0 3.5 9.5 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] 3 2 1 5 4 ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Men Women Means Not a feminist 50 30 40.0 Feminist 23 43 33.0 Strong feminist 10 17 13.5 No opinion 12 7 9.5 Anti-feminist 5 2 3.5 ``` ::: ::: Created a plot in the ascending order of Opinion. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](redesign_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: #### Creating a Bar chart created a dataframe ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` Men Women Strong feminist 10 17 Feminist 23 43 Not a feminist 50 30 Anti-feminist 5 2 No opinion 12 7 ``` ::: ::: ```{r} summary(data)} ``` ::: {.cell} ::: Below Barchart displays the Opinion about Feminism based on Gender ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](redesign_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-11-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: Below Graph is the Grouped bar charts representing the opinion based on Gender. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](redesign_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-12-1.png){width=672} ::: ::: In the below barchart when we hover on each bar we can see the details of each bar. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display}
